channel.title: gh on Travis' Blog
channel.description: Recent content in gh on Travis' Blog

item.title: gh
item.description: Docs https://cli.github.com/manual/ Install Configure gh config set editor vim gh config set editor "code --wait" gh config set git_protocol ssh --host github.com gh config set prompt disabled Usage brew install gh gh auth status gh auth login --with-token < token.txt gh auth login -h github.com gh auth logout -h github.com gh repo list
